overview: The Sun Stone is a Hardmode, post-Golem accessory which has a 1/7 (14.29%) chance to drop from Golem. It grants the same stat bonuses as the Moon Stone; however, these bonuses only activate during the day.
tips: When worn with the Avenger Emblem, the damage bonus can be increased to +22% damage. When worn with the Ranger, Sorcerer, Summoner, or Warrior Emblems, the damage of that particular class will be increased by 25%. In addition, a Wrath Potion increases damage of all classes by 10%. Finally, if reforged to menacing, your damage increases by 4% more per accessory.
title: Sun Stone
tooltip: If worn during the day, grants minor increase to damage, melee speed, critical strike chance, life regeneration, defense, mining speed, and minion knockback
